org.scec.sha.surface
Class GriddedSurface

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.scec.data.Container2D
        |
        +--org.scec.sha.surface.GriddedSurface
All Implemented Interfaces:
Container2DAPI, GriddedSurfaceAPI, NamedObjectAPI, java.io.Serializable
public class GriddedSurface
extends Container2D
implements GriddedSurfaceAPI

Title: GriddedSurface
Description: Implements a GriddedSurfaceAPI and Container2DAPI. The main difference is that this class only accepts Location Objects in it's grid
Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001
Company:

See Also:
